creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: vertical rows of applique and embroidery in geometric patterns in yellow, orange, pink and green; fringe on bottom is very thin, woven; band has continuous diamond embroidery; lined in blue

10 1/4 x 8 1/2 in. (26.04 x 21.59 cm)

title: Apron
